info.name: AppData Patch
info.summary: Move the 'appdata_[instanceid]' directory to a different location.
info.description: This app allows administrators to relocate the 'appdata_[instanceid]' directory to a different location instead of 'data.' This is especially useful when using 'objectstore' for remote storage because it defaults to storing the appdata directory to the remote storage. This results in excessive requests to the remote storage and slows down Nextcloud considerably.
info.author: Andrew Summers
